# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate for the speech recognizer object.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any NSSpeechRecognizerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must conform to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechRecognizerDelegate] protocol.

## Handling the Recognition of a Spoken Command

- **NSSpeechRecognizerDelegate**: A set of optional methods implemented by delegates of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechRecognizer] objects.
